Player History
Injured on 5/11/1967 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/1/1969 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 9/14/1969 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 10/3/1969...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Had first career hit on 6/2/1970, off Bill Wakefield (LA)...
Drafted in 3rd round, 49th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1976...
Injured on 9/7/1977 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from St. Louis to Texas on 6/16/1978 (Going to STL: 2B R. Smith, 3B T. Perez, SS T. Harrah, P R. Moffitt. Going to TEX: 2B J. Castino, 1B L. Durham, CF D. Ford, P P. Falcone)...
Injured on 8/7/1978 with a Broken Ankle, out for full season...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1980, off Jay Franklin (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1980, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
